Card.Name: Sage of Epityr
Card.RulesText: When Sage of Epityr enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

Card.Name: Whirlpool Rider
Card.RulesText: When Whirlpool Rider enters the battlefield, shuffle the cards from your hand into your library, then draw that many cards.

Card.Name: Rayne, Academy Chancellor
Card.RulesText: Whenever you or a permanent you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, you may draw a card. You may draw an additional card if Rayne, Academy Chancellor is enchanted.

Card.Name: Man-O'-War
Card.RulesText: When Man-o'-War enters the battlefield, return target creature to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Temporal Adept
Card.RulesText: {U}{U}{U}, {T}: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Somnophore
Card.RulesText: Flying Whenever Somnophore deals damage to a player, tap target creature that player controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Somnophore remains on the battlefield.

Card.Name: Palinchron
Card.RulesText: Flying When Palinchron enters the battlefield, untap up to seven lands. {2}{U}{U}: Return Palinchron to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Sleight of Mind
Card.RulesText: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of one color word with another. (For example, you may change "target black spell" to "target blue spell." This effect lasts indefinitely.)

Card.Name: High Tide
Card.RulesText: Until end of turn, whenever a player taps an Island for mana, that player adds an additional {U}.

Card.Name: Tidal Bore
Card.RulesText: You may return an Island you control to its owner's hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. You may tap or untap target creature.

Card.Name: Counterspell
Card.RulesText: Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Misstep
Card.RulesText: Creatures target player controls don't untap during that player's next untap step.

Card.Name: Stasis
Card.RulesText: Players skip their untap steps. At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Stasis unless you pay {U}.

Card.Name: Energy Field
Card.RulesText: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you by sources you don't control. When a card is put into your graveyard from anywhere, sacrifice Energy Field.

Card.Name: Tolarian Winds
Card.RulesText: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.

Card.Name: Overburden
Card.RulesText: Whenever a player puts a nontoken creature onto the battlefield, that player returns a land they control to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Twitch
Card.RulesText: You may tap or untap target artifact, creature, or land. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Exclude
Card.RulesText: Counter target creature spell. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Rushing River
Card.RulesText: Kicker—Sacrifice a land. (You may sacrifice a land in addition to any other costs as you cast this spell.) Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. If this spell was kicked, return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

Card.Name: Repulse
Card.RulesText: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

Card.Name: Theft of Dreams
Card.RulesText: Draw a card for each tapped creature target opponent controls.

Card.Name: Fact or Fiction
Card.RulesText: Reveal the top five cards of your library. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard.

Card.Name: Clone
Card.RulesText: You may have Clone enter the battlefield as a copy of any creature on the battlefield.

Card.Name: Control Magic
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature You control enchanted creature.

Card.Name: Treachery
Card.RulesText: Enchant creature When Treachery enters the battlefield, untap up to five lands. You control enchanted creature.

Card.Name: Force of Will
Card.RulesText: You may pay 1 life and exile a blue card from your hand rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Counter target spell.

Card.Name: Mishra's Factory
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}: Mishra's Factory becomes a 2/2 Assembly-Worker artifact creature until end of turn. It's still a land. {T}: Target Assembly-Worker creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

Card.Name: Rishadan Port
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {1}, {T}: Tap target land.

Card.Name: Desert
Card.RulesText: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.
